Fast_API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(contact: ContactRequest, db: Session, current_user: User) → Contact¶

Retrieves a list of notes for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • contact (NoteModel) – Data for the created contact.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

  • current_user (User) – creates a contact for the user.

Returns:

Creates a contact for a specific user.

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.search_contacts(q: str, skip: int, limit: int, db: Session, current_user: User) → list[Type[Contact]]¶

Searches for contacts for a specific user with the specified pagination options.

Parameters:

  • q (str) – Search parameter.

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

  • current_user (User) – search a contacts for the user.

Returns:

Searches for contacts for a specific user.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.upcoming_birthdays(db: Session, current_user: User) → list[Type[Contact]]¶

Shows upcoming birthdays for contacts 7 days in advance.

Parameters:

  • current_user (User) – gets a birthdays for the users.

Returns:
